topic: vnd.radiance is now an IANA image media type
body:
I am pleased to be able to write that the IANA accepted our media type 
registration. See 
<http://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/image/vnd.radiance>.




Randolph Fritz
  design machine group
  architecture department
  university of washington
rfritz at u.washington.edu
___
